column5: Noticed some of the paint is coming off where the turntable wheels run.It;'s a better microwave and big.Is there a paint if I sand it down first would work?.Still works great but I'm starting to hear a bit of arcing. Always appreciate your responses.Thanks .
There are high heat paint that might stay on, but I dont think putting them inside to cook with your food is a great idea. I would just replace it.

Funny you say this , my microwave caught fire yesterday , chipped paint around the turn table shaft , turn table plastic supports caught fire .( no damage to the house ) blackened cupboards is all . I then started looking for a right hand hinged door , sounds easy eh ? Impossible unless you want to spend over 700 $ for a 1.5 cu/ft unit ... 1.5 cu/ft stainless unit on sale at CTC right now for 99$ , replace it ... but .. take the old one apart  and keep the magnet .. Well worth it , very strong ! If you're for painting it , epoxy paint would be the way to go I'd guess ...

It's not that I won't replace it,and I will if need be.It is painted with some kind of paint and it is only in one spot of it's travel They painted it with something?,Thanks guys. Mines a 1.5,hard to get for a good price,but $99 doesn't sound bad at all.
Sorry I just looked at the box and it's a 1.1 cu/ft
